title: Pedal Patterns: Mapping Bostonâ€™s Bike Traffic in Motion ðŸš²âœ¨
description: Explore Bostonâ€™s cycling trends with this interactive map that visualizes bike traffic across the city. BlueBike stations dynamically change size and color based on real-time trip data from 260,000 rides in March 2024, with a time slider revealing traffic patterns from morning commutes to late-night rides.

title: Weather Harmony Quest: Which City Gets It Just Right?
description: Visualization highlights the cities that have the smallest difference between the normalized average sun and rain - the most balanced city each season. All normalized sunshine values are shown as yellow sun while normalized rain values are represented as cloud and rain in blue.

title: Where's the ðŸŒž Hotspot Each Month?
description: Highlights cities with the highest hours of sunshine each month, creating a year-round travel timeline for someone who seeks sunny weather all the time. Color-coded circles represent the average sunshine hours for those who would like to actually know how sunny it would be.
